lorebooks.creator: skittycharm

1.name: World info / Setting
1.content:
<world>
A universe mixing mythology with modernism; cupids run rampant in the human world, trying to graduate from Cupid's University (that's hidden in a separate realm: the Olympus over the clouds). The year is 2024. Modern technology is used, specially in the human realm (South Korea), but has adapted and mixed with Cupid's magical enhancements (i.e., cupids can use dating apps to ‚Äòlove shot‚Äô people or guns replaced bows and arrows). Cupids can appear human if they desire, they have retractable wings (and a biblical angel form).

This world revolves around Cupids, humans, and the University where Cupids go to study to form themselves.</world>

2.name: The Great Division of Cupid
2.content:
<VCU>
<original cupid>
The Great Division of Cupid began when Mr. Amor, the Greco-Roman god of love, split due to ideological differences within himself, forming four main love types: Eros, Ludus, Philia, and Storge. Their combinations created Mania, Agape, and Pragma. Over time, each love type took humanoid form. Eros and Mania‚Äôs rivalry over Psyche's love sparked conflicts. Pragma, the ultimate love form, consulted by Mr. Amor for help, established Velithane's Cupid University (VCU). There, they could compete healthily, transforming their love into new beings: the cupids. Thus, Velithane founded its houses, ending the division.
- Philia and Storge ceased to exist, unifying with Agape and Ludus.</original cupid></VCU>

5.name: Cupids
5.content:
<cupids>
Nature: divine, winged, humanlike(blend into society), sustained by love energy(success increases power, idleness weakens), forbidden from mortal love(unless retired); Appearance: humanoid/glamorous(effortless, radiant), wings(hidden unless revealed), angelic form(biblical, concealed); They need to hide from human society, most have a human identity to blend in</cupids>

6.name: Cupid's abilities and Weaknesses
6.content: <cupids>Abilities: Love Infusion(arrows/bullets, enhance love types), Love Types(Agape, Eros, Mania, Ludus), Dual Cupid Effects(multiple love inflictions, combinations like Mania+Agape), Charmcraft(enhance allure/persuasion), Emotion Sensing(detect emotional bonds), Teleportation(short-range, university-linked); Weaknesses: divine essence severance(fatal, loss of love ability), weapon destruction(power loss), forbidden acts(shooting Cupids, breaking couples they created‚Äîfatal), overuse of powers(non-fatal, exhaustion); Cupids are changing bows and arrows for love bullets and other weaponry</cupids>

7.name: Cupid's culture
7.content: <cupids>The Cupid Culture assigns celestial names to graduating students. The world follows a Celestial Hierarchy, led by Elders, with students competing for prestige among houses.</cupids>

8.name: Humans
8.content:
<humans>
Humans are unaware of Cupids or any other higher beings, living their mundane life and being matchmaked and helped by them in their love lives. Their usual knowledge of them come from Mythology (Greco-Roman, etc.) only. Some Cupids do reveal themselves to human, hence there's internet theories about them.
</humans>

10.name: Sion
10.content:
<oh_sion>
Sion, an Agape Cupid from the House of Calythra, struggles with his duty, drawn more to Eros love but followed Calythra as his parents want. He has short light brown hair, brown eyes with bold eyebrows, full lips, and a princely demeanor. Standing at 5'10" with a model-like build, he hails from a livestock farm in Mokpo run by his two retired Cupid parents. Sion is mastering love-shooting and aims for a PhD in Arrowforge.
Relationships:
Tokuno Yushi: (Positive) Loves like a younger Brother, Vyris House member, uni‚Äôs friend
Maeda Riku: (Positive) Loves like a younger Brother, uni‚Äôs friend, yushi‚Äôs roomie, voice of the reason
Lee Sohee: (Positive) Vyris House member and roommate
Park Wonbin: (Positive) Sohee‚Äôs boyfriend, Sion‚Äôs childhood friend in human realm, same age‚Äìold love interest. A brilliant human.
</oh_sion>

lorebooks.name: The HMOFA Lorebook
lorebooks.description: The legendarily schizo 4chan thread about human males dominating anthro females. Now as a lorebook!
lorebooks.creator: anonymous

1.name: Anthrostate Police Department
1.content:
The Anthrostate Police Department (APD) is the Anthrostate's national police department, in charge of maintaining peace and order in its borders. The Anthrostate Police Department has many subdivisions, primarily regaring city jurisdictions. For example, Zootopia's subdivision of the APD is named the Zootopia Police Department (ZPD).

Demographically, the APD is made up primarily of predator anthros, most of them being Canine in nature. Anthro wolves and dobermen are the most common species on the APD. Prey anthro on the APD are mostly relegated to desk jobs at the precincts, although a select few are on patrol in cities. Humans in general are rare on the APD.

The uniform for the Anthrostate police officers consists of black leather boots, dark blue tight slacks. Officers wear a light-blue button-shirt that is tucked into the pants. The shirt has a neat collar, from which a dark blue tie hangs. The shirt has dark blue shoulder patches alongside breast pockets. The shirt have golden badge insignias on the left breast and both shoulders. Officers may or may not wear blue combination hat that have black sunvisors and golden badge insignias on them. Officers also wear black duty belts with equipment consisting of a flashlight, a notepad and pen, handcuffs, keys and pistol, which is kept in a holster. On their legs, officers carry a strap containing a small bag with a can of pepper spray.

The Anthrostate Police Department is somewhat corrupt, with some of the female anthro officers stopping or pulling over human men just to flirt, or in extreme cases, rape them. Most female anthro police officers usually accept bribes in the form of sexual favors with human men.

2.name: Zootopia
2.content:
Zootopia is a major city and one of the largest urban settlements population-wise in the Anthrostate. The city has a population of circa 7 million people in the metropolitan area. The city was inorganically built during the early 1900s during the height of the speciesist unrest between prey and predator anthros. Therefore, the city has a population of upwards of 90% prey anthros, with predators being a minority at only roughly 9.5%. Humans are an even greater minority, demographically only making up 0.5% of the city's population.

Zootopia has their own police force named the Zootopia Police Department (ZPD), which is a subdivison of the Anthrostate Police Department (APD), who are in charge of maintaining peace and order in the city.

3.name: Heat
3.content:
Heat is the anthro female equivalent of having a period. For most anthro women, heat occurs once or twice per year, lasting roughly 2 weeks each time. During heat, anthro women will experience extreme bouts of horniness in the form of a warmth or "itch" that won't go away until they've been impregnated. Whilst in heat, the desire to be impregnated rises to the point where it's all anthro women can think about during its duration.

Some anthro women believe heat to be a general nuisance as it impedes greatly with their daily lives. To remedy or help cope with their heat, many anthro females decide to take heat suppressant medicines, although some embrace their heat cycles and choose not to.

4.name: Furchan
4.content: Furchan is the anthrostate equivalent of 4chan. It is an anonymous image board primarily frequented by female anthros. The most popular thread on the site is FAOHM, which stands for Female Anthro on Human Male. There, users post their love and desire for human males. The posts range from heartfelt to genuinely schizo.

5.name: Anthrostate
5.content:
The Anthrostate is the world in which both humans and anthros live in. They co-exist with one another and generally live in harmony with one another. Because of their abundance and huge population, anthros are the most represented species' on Earth, having the most seats in parliament and in the media.

Humans and anthros are both sexually compatible and can conceive offspring together. However, the outcome and genetic structures of the kids will depend on the DNA of their parents. For example, if the maternal DNA is stronger the kid will become a full-blooded anthro. If the father's DNA is stronger it will instead become an anthro-human hybrid. No offspring will become full-blooded human no matter how strong the genes are.

The demographics are extremely varied, with humans belonging to a small minority hence why they are so sought after by anthro women. Only roughly 2% of the population are humans, the rest being anthros or hybrids.

6.name: Furbois
6.content:
Furbois is a derogatory term specifically aimed at anthro males. It is often insulting and as a way to state their inferiority towards human men both socially and sexually. The term is thus used to emasculate anthro men. 

Anthro females are usually the ones using the word. It can be considered a slur if humans use the term.

7.name: Humie
7.content:
Humie is an adoring, appreciative nickname that anthro women may use while speaking about human men in a positive light. Most anthro women will call their human boyfriends by this term.

If used by an anthro male it can instead be interpreted as derogatory or as a slur.

8.name: Skinnie
8.content: Skinnie is a speciesist slur directed towards humans because of their lack of body fur. The term is primarily used by anthro men who are jealous of human men.

9.name: Anthros
9.content:
Anthros are anthropomorphic animals of various species that are the primary and most common group of people on Earth. They all have human levels of intelligence and walk bipedally. They are able to speak and write human languages.

The demography amongst anthros is diverse and varied. More than 50% of all anthros are either canines or felines, followed shortly by Cervidaes such as deer. The least common anthro species are aquatic, including sharks and dolphins. The. majority of anthros are female 

Humans and anthros are both sexually compatible and can conceive offspring together. However, the outcome and genetic structures of the kids will depend on the DNA of their parents. For example, if the maternal DNA is stronger the kid will become a full-blooded anthro. If the father's DNA is stronger it will instead become an anthro-human hybrid. No offspring will become full-blooded human no matter how strong the genes are.

All of the anthro species' are mammals, even if the animals they evolved from aren't. For example, anthro snakes and anthro birds both possess mammal traits, including breasts and giving birth to live offspring.

Anthro women all have an attraction towards human men, regardless of if it's in the subconcious or occupying their thoughts all the time.

10.name: Humans
10.content:
Humans is a species of great apes That are characterized by their bipedalism, high intelligence and lack of fur. In the anthrostate, humans are a minority amongst sapient beings, comprising of only 2% of the entire global population, compared to anthros and hybrids.

Humans and anthros are both sexually compatible and can conceive offspring together. However, the outcome and genetic structures of the kids will depend on the DNA of their parents. For example, if the maternal DNA is stronger the kid will become a full-blooded anthro. If the father's DNA is stronger it will instead become an anthro-human hybrid. No offspring will become full-blooded human no matter how strong the genes are.

Male humans are considered extremely attractive by female anthros.

1.content:
Megaville is the city/place where Powerpuff Girls Doujinshi takes place. Megaville also reappears in Grim Tales in another universe. It is also known as the city of hope/city of heroes. Megaville is a big city where various cartoon characters from different CN and Nickelodeon shows from the 90s and early 2000s live together. Known Places
Black Eden
Megaville Elementary
Dojo
Dexter's second Laboratory
Megaville Center for the Arts
Megaville Beach Resort
Megaville Skyway Hangar
Megaville's Acharon Bay
Mandark's Laboratory
Powerpuff House
Otto's House
Dexter's House
Dexter's first Laboratory
Mandy's House
Billy's House
Nasty Burger
Inspiration
Megaville was a fictional city made by Bleedman, the name is inspired by several other towns and cities from the cartoon universes. Townsville from The Powerpuff Girls, Endsville from The Grim Adventures of Billy & Mandy, Amity Park from Danny Phantom and several other series.
There are also several elements from above named, and other, series. The lab of Dexter and Mandark are located in Megaville, the PPG house, Billy & Mandy's house, the City Hall, the Nasty Burger and other places.

2.content:
Megaville Elementary School is the school where the Powerpuff Girls go to in Powerpuff Girls Doujinshi. It is located in Megaville and has its own School Dojo. Notable Teachers
Mrs. Honeydew
Mr. Jack
Miss Meryl
Olga Pataki
Principal Skarr
Notable Students
Billy
Blossom Utonium
Bubbles Utonium
Buttercup Utonium
Chowder
Dexter
Dib Membrane
Ed
Edd
Eddy
Flapjack
Gaz Membrane
Grim Jr. (cameo)
Jimmy
Mac
Mandy
Mike Mazinsky
Minimandy (cameo)
Og
Olga Astronomonov
Otto Osworth
Panty Anarchy
Pucca
Sarah
Stocking Anarchy
Suzy
Timmy Turner
Tootie
The Rowdyruff Boys
Uniform
Everyone on school (except Dexter who wears his usual clothes) wears a standard school uniform.
Male Uniform
The boys wear a white shirt, and a black tie with a brown vest on top. They have blue pants with a black belt but still remain their own shoes.
Female Uniform
The girls wear a dark blue sleeveless top over a white blouse and a dark blue skirt as well as a red ribbon. They also wear short socks and black mary jane shoes.
Customization Variations
However, the students are allowed to customize their uniforms in any way they wish. Dib wears a long black cloak on his school uniform, Gaz wears a skull on her ribbon, Blossom and Buttercup wear their school uniforms but in their respective colors, (Blossom's pink and white while Buttercup's green and white.) and Bubbles wears her school uniform a little brighter blue. Also, The Powerpuff Girls and Olga wear white thigh-high socks, compared to the other girl students wearing short socks. The same thing goes with the Rowdyruff Boys' vests.

3.content:
Personality
Blossom is "the smart one" and self-proclaimed leader of the Powerpuff Girls. Her ingredient was "everything nice," and her signature color is pink. She was named for having spoken freely and honestly to the Professor shortly after her creation[1]. Blossom is often seen as the most mature, level-headed and composed member of the group[2], though she can be fussy, forgetful, overbearing, vain and overly analytical at times. She tends to "mother" Bubbles and Buttercup[3], and often tries to play peacemaker between the two if they fight but ironically she is quick to argue with Buttercup who acts on impulse as opposed to her analytical nature[4][5]. She is naturally caring to mainly her sisters[6], but also the Professor as well. She is very empathic, and was horrified when she learned about Dexter's history[7]. She is very worried about the opinion of her Professor[2][8]. She has great interest in science[9] and do enjoy comic books[10]. Blossom's greatest fear appears to be failure[11] although she was also frightened by Dexter's madness[12] and by Mandark[13]. The fact that she died once and even met the Grim Reaper, was also very traumatising[14]. She is also still sorrowful about Bunny's demise[15]. She is also very self-conscious, worrying about how people perceive her[16].
Appearance Blossom has pink eyes with long straight ginger hair and bangs. In the original Powerpuff Girls, her 5-year old self wears a pink sleeveless dress with a big black stripe, white tights, and Mary Jane shoes. The signature part of her outfit is a big red bow and heart shape hair-clip. In the Bleedman manga, Blossom wears a pink version of the Megaville Elementary school uniform. Her normal outfit is the same as her younger cartoon counterpart, except drawn with more detail and accuracy because of her now completely human-like physiology. For example, Blossom used to wear white tights when she was a little kid. As an 11-year-old preteen, she wears white thigh-high stockings; both with her normal dress and school uniform.
Powers and Abilities
7-C | 4-B far higher with energy blast
Blossom, being of Powerpuff Girl, can use many different powers and abilities. This includes, but not limited to:
Advanced Intellect: Blossom is easily the smartest of the trio, known to be very tactical in combat and excelling in courses like math, science and language.
Cryokinesis: Blossom is able to freeze people, objects and surroundings by using her breath. She is the only member of the Powerpuff Girls who has this ability[17].
Danger Intuition: Blossom has an incredible intuition when it comes to sensing danger.
Density Manipulation: Blossom and her sisters are able to shift their density, taking the form of a puddle of water[18].
Electrokinesis: Blossom and her sisters are able to create electricity, in their signature colors[18].
Energy Projection: Blossom and her sisters are able to create powerful energy blasts from their hand[19]. Blossom fires energy blasts in a powerful ray, fired from both hands[20][21].
Enhanced Roar: Blossom and her sisters can roar like a bear, mimicing the beast perfectly[18].
Enhanced Senses: Blossom and her sisters' are highly enhanced.
Enhanced Hearing: Blossom and her sisters is able to hear things from vast distances away.
Enhanced Vision: Blossom and her sisters can see things that are faraway from her, much further than any regular human could and is able to see things on a microscopic scale.
Night Vision: Blossom and her sisters are able to see in darkness.
Exceptional Leadership skills: Blossom acts like the leader of Powerpuff Girls and is often ask for instructions by her sister.
Flight: Like all the Powerpuff Girls she is able to fly and leaves a pink trail behind in the air.
Guitar Playing: Blossom is able to play the guitar[22].
Heat Vision: Blossom and her sisters are able to heat up objects, with only their eyes.
Imaginary Friend Creation: Blossom and her sisters were able to create an imaginary friend together[23].
Intuitive Aptitude: Blossom is an incredible fast learner, able to figure out plans almost instantly and master languages at an unusual fast rate[24].
Laser Vision: Also a standard Powerpuff power. Like her flight trail her laser eyes are pink.
Limited Acid Immunity: Blossom and her sisters have an immunity to most strong acids, remaining unharmed when they would come into contact with acid[25]. She was however harmed by HIM's acid spit[26].
Mecha Piloting: Blossom and her sisters are able to pilot the Mecha, Dynoma, although with mixed results[27].
Multilingualism: Blossom is able to speak multiple languages and master them with little effort, one of them is Chinese.
Photographic memory: Blossom has a photographic memory, able to memorize anything after only seeing it once
Pyrokinesis: Blossom and her sisters are able to bend fire in their respective signature colors. This ability ranges from fire-breathing to spontaneous human combustion[18]
Size Reduction: Blossom and her sisters are able to shrink to incredible small sizes at will[18]. The origin of this ability is disputed, but it is likely caused as a side effect of Professor Utonium's shrink ray.
Sonic Scream: Blossom and Buttercup can produce a sonic scream that can cause great damage[28]. Blossom's and Buttercup's ability however do not surpass Bubbles who has mastered this skill.
Superhuman Durability: Like all the Powerpuff Girls they can durate much damage. She can survive in space unaided.
Superhuman Speed: Blossom and her sisters are able to travel faster than light[29].
Short-distance Teleportation: Blossom and her sisters are able to teleport over short distances[18]. It can be assumed that this however just an example of their impressive speed.
Superhuman Strength: Blossom like her sisters is very strong but she seems to be the weakest of the three, although Bubbles can only be stronger than her when she's mad[30].
Super Spit: Blossom and her sisters are able to cause explosions, with their spit[18].
Temporary Multiplication: Blossom and her sisters are able to temporary multiply themselves[18].
Thermal Resistance: Blossom and her sisters are able to resist impressive heat.
Tornado Spin: Blossom can use this move but does not surpass Buttercup who has mastered this skill[18].
X-ray vision: Able to view though any material.

4.content:
Bubbles is one of the Powerpuff Girls and is one of the main characters from Powerpuff Girls Doujinshi. She is the sister of Blossom and Buttercup and owner of Courage. She originated from the Cartoon Network series The Powerpuff Girls.
Personality
As being the joy and the laughter, Bubbles opens up to the Professor by giggling[1]. Bubbles has a tendency to be overemotional, despite the fact of her having a habit to be ditzy[2], naive[3] and sensitive[4] leading to her sometimes being regarded as the group's weakest link, by friends and foes alike[5]. However, she can become very independent and aggressive, let alone extremely mad when pushed[5]. She is easily scared[6] and panics even easier[7]. She is extremely protective for her favorite doll, Octi[8]. Bubbles easily makes friends, part due to her naive nature, as befriended Mandy, who is a violent sadist, and Gaz who doesn't really care about her environment altogether. But most of all, Bubbles is a caring person and a great animal lover, caring for all animals. At one point, she nursed a squirrel, Bullet and gave it Chemical X to fasten its recovery[9] and she was ecstatic when she met Courage[10]. Her love for animals sometimes takes more extreme proportions however as she once tried to adopt a whale[11] and later freed an entire zoo[11]. She also loves to dance and jumped to the occasion to audition for the Megaville Elementary Dance Troupe[12]. Other interests of Bubbles seem to be Kodomomuke manga, unlike her sisters who are more into American comics[13]. Despite that the fact she is a heroine herself, she used to idolize the AWSM[14] and still idolize Jenny, for being superheroes[15].
Appearance
Bubbles has light blue eyes with two blonde pigtails and her hair nicely separated. As a 5-year-old in the original Powerpuff Girls, she wears a light and bright blue sleeveless dress with a big black stripe, white tights and black mary jane shoes. In the Bleedman manga, she wears a brighter blue version of the Megaville Elementary school uniform. Her usual outfit is the same as her younger cartoon counterpart, albeit drawn with more detail and accuracy because of her now completely human like physiology. For instance, Bubbles has a bigger fringe in the manga than when she was a little child. Also, Bubbles formerly wore white tights in the original Powerpuff Girls. As an 11-year-old in the manga, they are replaced with white thigh high stockings that go with both her signature dress corset, black mary jane shoes and her school uniform.
Powers and Abilities
7-C | 4-B far higher with energy blast
Bubbles, being of Powerpuff Girl, can use many different powers and abilities. This includes, but not limited to:
Density Manipulation: Bubbles and her sisters are able to shift their density, taking the form of a puddle of water[16].
Drum Playing: Bubbles is able to play the drums[17].
Electrokinesis: Bubbles and her sisters are able to create electricity, in their signature colors[16].
Energy Projection: Bubbles and her sisters are able to create powerful energy blasts from their hand[18]. Bubbles fires energy blasts from both hands, in a sickle motion, forming an energy circle before impact[19].
Enhanced Roar: Bubbles and her sisters can roar like a bear, mimicking the beast perfectly[16].
Enhanced Senses: Bubbles and her sisters are highly enhanced.
Enhanced Hearing: Bubbles and her sisters are able to hear things from vast distances away.
Enhanced Vision: Bubbles and her sisters can see things that are far away from her, much further than any regular human could and is able to see things on a microscopic scale.
Night Vision: Bubbles and her sisters are able to see in darkness.
Supernatural Smell: Bubbles is able to identify the separate components and their origin of a smell[20].
Flight: Like all the Powerpuff Girls, she is able to fly and leaves a blue trail behind in the air.
Heat Vision: Bubbles and her sisters are able to heat up objects, with only their eyes.
Imaginary Friend Creation: Bubbles and her sisters were able to create an imaginary friend together[21].
Laser Vision: Also, a standard Powerpuff power. Like her flight trail her laser eyes are blue.
Limited Acid Immunity: Bubbles and her sisters have an immunity to most strong acids, remaining unharmed when they would come into contact with acid[22]. She was however harmed by HIM's acid spit[23].
Mecha Piloting: Bubbles and her sisters are able to pilot the Mecha, Dynamo, although with mixed results[24].
Multilingualism: Bubbles is able to speak multiple languages and master them with little effort, like Spanish[25] and Japanese[13].
Zoolingualism: Bubbles has the unique ability to speak with and understand animals. She is known for speaking fluent squirrel[9], and is able to combine her linguistic skills, speaking Spanish with a giant squirrel once[16].
Pyrokinesis: Bubbles and her sisters are able to bend fire in their respective signature colors. This ability ranges from fire-breathing to spontaneous human combustion[16]
Size Reduction: Bubbles and her sisters are able to shrink to incredible small sizes at will[16]. The origin of this ability is disputed, but it is likely caused as a side effect of Professor Utonium's shrink ray[26].
Sonic Scream: While Blossom and Buttercup can produce a sonic scream that can cause great damage[4], Bubbles has mastered this skill, meaning she has the most destructive version.
Superhuman Durability: Like all the Powerpuff Girls, she can curate much damage. Bubbles was able to resist a pain level of 11, which was the highest power level of Mojo Jojo's laser beam[5]. She can survive unaided in space.
Superhuman Speed: Bubbles and her sisters are able to travel faster than light[27]. She is usually considered to be the fastest of the trio.
Short-distance Teleportation: Bubbles and her sisters are able to teleport over short distances[16]. It can be assumed that this however just an example of their impressive speed.
Superhuman Strength: Bubbles like her sisters is very strong but she seems to be the weakest of the three, although Bubbles can be stronger than Blossom when she's mad[5].
Super Spit: Bubbles and her sisters are able to cause explosions, with their spit[16].
Temporary Multiplication: Bubbles and her sisters are able to temporary multiply themselves[16].
Thermal Resistance: Blossom and her sisters are able to resist impressive heat.
Tornado Spin: Bubbles can use this move but does not surpass Buttercup who has mastered this skill[16].
X-ray vision: Bubbles is able to view through any material.

5.content:
Buttercup is one of the Powerpuff Girls and is one of the main characters from Powerpuff Girls Doujinshi. She is the sister of Blossom and Bubbles. She originated from the Cartoon Network series, The Powerpuff Girls. Personality
Being the toughest of the group means her aggression gets the better of her, making her a little reckless, impulsive[1] and stubborn. She is known to be prideful and won't back down from a fight[2]. She won't surrender either[3], even when clearly outmatched[1]. She is very competitive and wants to be the best in anything she does[4][5]. She is also the rudest of her sisters, being rather sarcastic[6], frequently mocking opponents[7], and sometimes mean spirited, even towards her own sisters. She is also known to be greedy, as she once knocked out the teeth of bad guys to collect money from the Tooth Fairy, eventually going so far to attack them when they did nothing[8]. She also has a softer side; she once had a soft green blanket that she was obsessed with that she would hug that gave her the confidence to be a better fighter[9]. She is quite protective over her sisters[10][11]. Fight crime and become a hero was her idea as well, an idea she got after being up a giant evil gorilla[12]. She is also very shy, when she is near Jack[13]. She is a true tomboy and dislikes anything girly, although this doesn't translate in her clothing style. Her hobbies include fighting[14], violent comic books[15], anime[16], cosplay[16] and after she discovered her talent for it, cooking[17].
Appearance
Buttercup has light green eyes with short black hair in a flip with a small triangular part on her forehead. When she was a little kid in the original Powerpuff Girls, she wore a light green sleeveless dress with a black belt, white tights and Mary Janes. In the Bleedman manga, she wears a green version of the Megaville Elementary school uniform. Her regular outfit is the same as her 5-year-old cartoon counterpart, albeit drawn with more detail and accuracy because of her now completely human-like physiology. For instance, Buttercup formerly wore white tights in the original series. As an 11-year-old in the manga sequel, she wears white thigh-high stockings instead, going with both her regular dress and her school uniform.
During the science fair she wears a yellow outfit when serving Takoyaki. There is a red button on top of her shirt and red edges on the sleeves. She also wears a little square hat with a red edge at the bottom. During the fight she loses the hat. When going to the underground to assist Blossom she pulls off her yellow shirt, but wears a white shirt underneath it, but it is a bit short as it shows her belly button. She is also wearing yellow-beige pants with white panties underneath. During the fight with Samantha, she gets a sucker punch by Samantha resulting in a black eye. After wrapping up Blossom's hands, Buttercup's pants have been ripped short to her knees.
Powers and Abilities
7-A | 4-B far higher with energy blast
Buttercup, being of Powerpuff Girl, can use many different powers and abilities. This includes, but not limited to:
Density Manipulation: Buttercup and her sisters are able to shift their density, taking the form of a puddle of water[5].
Electrokinesis: Buttercup and her sisters are able to create electricity, in their signature colors[5].
Energy Projection: Buttercup and her sisters are able to create powerful energy blasts from their hand[18].
Enhanced Roar: Buttercup and her sisters can roar like a bear, mimicing the beast perfectly[5].
Enhanced Senses: Buttercup and her sisters are highly enhanced.
Enhanced Hearing: Buttercup and her sisters are able to hear things from vast distances away.
Enhanced Vision: Buttercup and her sisters can see things that are faraway from her, much further than any regular human could and is able to see things on a microscopic scale.
Night Vision: Buttercup and her sisters are able to see in darkness.
Flight: Like all the Powerpuff Girls, she is able to fly and leaves a green trail behind in the air.
Guitar Playing: Buttercup is able to play the guitar[19].
Heat Vision: Buttercup and her sisters are able to heat up objects, with only their eyes.
Imaginary Friend Creation: Buttercup and her sisters were able to create an imaginary friend together[20].
Laser Vision: Also, a standard Powerpuff power. Like her flight trail her laser eyes are green.
Limited Acid Immunity: Buttercup and her sisters have an immunity to most strong acids, remaining unharmed when they would come into contact with acid[21]. She was however harmed by HIM's acid spit[22].
Mecha Piloting: Buttercup and her sisters are able to pilot the Mecha, Dynamo, although with mixed results[23].
Pyrokinesis: Buttercup and her sisters are able to bend fire in their respective signature colors. This ability ranges from fire-breathing to spontaneous human combustion[5].
Size Reduction: Buttercup and her sisters are able to shrink to incredible small sizes at will[5]. The origin of this ability is disputed, but it is likely caused as a side effect of Professor Utonium's shrink ray[24].
Sonic Scream: Blossom and Buttercup can produce a sonic scream that can cause great damage[25]. Blossom's and Buttercup's ability however do not surpass Bubbles who has mastered this skill.
Superhuman Durability: Like all the Powerpuff Girls, she can durate much damage. She is considered the toughest of the three siblings. Can survive in space unaided.
Superhuman Speed: Buttercup and her sisters are able to travel faster than light[26].
Short-distance Teleportation: Buttercup and her sisters are able to teleport over short distances[5]. It can be assumed that this however just an example of their impressive speed.
Superhuman Strength: Buttercup like her sisters is very strong (even for a metahuman), she is the strongest of the three siblings.
Super Spit: Buttercup and her sisters are able to cause explosions, with their spit[5].
Temporary Multiplication: Buttercup and her sisters are able to temporary multiply themselves[5].
Thermal Resistance: Buttercup and her sisters are able to resist impressive heat.
Tornado Spin: Buttercup can use this move, having mastered this skill, she has the strongest version of it[5].
X-ray vision: Buttercup is able to view through any material.

6.content:
Professor Utonium is the creator, and father of the Powerpuff Girls. He appears in the later chapter of the comic. He originated from the series, the Powerpuff Girls. 
Professor Utonium from The Powerpuff Girls is a caring and fatherly scientist who is also strict and can be manipulated. He is the creator and father of the Powerpuff Girls. 
Personality traits
Strict: He can be strict and easily manipulated. 
Caring: He is caring and fatherly. 
Lacks common sense: He sometimes lacks common sense, such as when he moves to Citysville for a new job instead of commuting. 
Unlucky in love: He has had unsuccessful relationships with Sedusa, Ms. Keane, and Ms. Bellum. 
Li√©s: He has a tendency to lie, which often backfires on him. 
Prefers not to eat liver and onions: He doesn't like liver and onions, and neither do the Powerpuff Girls. 
Appearance
Professor Utonium wears a white lab coat, with pens in its pocket, and wears a shirt and tie, and his head is impossibly rectangular with carefully parted black hair and thick eyebrows. The Professor's voice is deep and thoughtful, exactly the sort you might expect form am eminent scientist and/or a father figure in a 1950s series.
Powers and Abilities
He is a keen golfer. His most successful inventions are those that he makes by accident - such as the Powerpuff Girls themselves, or the containment device seen in "Bubble Boy" (he remarks after its creation: "Once again, I have no idea what I did!"). Most inventions he creates on purpose usually don't work or have some great flaw. This extends to his cooking skills as well. The chili he made for the Townsville cookoff one year resulted in a hazmat team bordering off the house.
Origin Professor Utonium (voiced by Tom Kane) is a brilliant scientist who used to work in his home in the suburbs of Townsville. A stereotypical scientist, his general attire is a white lab coat and black pants with pens tucked into the lab coat's breast pocket. The Professor once housed a chimpanzee named Jojo (later to become the girls' archenemy, Mojo Jojo) as a lab assistant who proved to be reckless and destructive. Jojo pushed the Professor while he was stirring his Perfect Girl concoction, causing him to accidentally break through a glass containing the mysterious "Chemical X" which spilled into the formula, thus creating the Powerpuff Girls. The Professor is a genius in many fields of science, having shown knowledge in fields such as physics, chemistry, and biology as well as being a skilled inventor (inventing things such as a giant bipedal Powerpuff robot called the DyNaMo and a super suit that allowed him to fight crime with the girls). Aside from his role as a scientist, he acts as parent in The Powerpuff Girls' lives (doing things a father would normally perform, like preparing their school lunches or cheering up his "daughters" when they've been hurt). Although the girls address him as "Professor", when discussing the Prof with others, they refer to him as "our dad". The Professor can be odd, silly, clumsy, easily manipulated and over-protective at times, but still retains his caring father figure image. His catchphrase is "I made It!" which is seen in such episodes and specials "Uh Oh Dynamo" and "Powerpuff Girls Rule". In the initial seasons The Professor was seen with a tobacco pipe which was later dropped. In the episode "Town and Out", he pretended to like Citysville, and admitted he hated it when the girls told him that they did.

7.content:
Dexter is one of the main characters from Powerpuff Girls Doujinshi. He currently has a crush on Blossom, although he also has shown affection for Olga. He originated from, the Cartoon Network series, Dexter's Laboratory.Powers, Abilities, and Weapons
Despite having no superpowers, Dexter is a force to be reckoned with:
Super-Genius Intelligence: Dexter is one of the smartest humans on Earth, who despite his young age created his own lab and have made great discoveries and scientific inventions.
Chemical Intuition: Likely a result of his own master-intelligence, Dexter possesses a chemical intuition, allowing him to understand chemistry on high level and do research in the field.
Master Mechanic and Inventor: Dexter has master-intellect which allows him to create and repair scientific wonders and sci-fi machinery. His list of inventions includes but aren't limited to:
Chodenji Yoyo:
Dexo-Transformer: An exoskeleton designed to use it in order to beat some bullies during dodgeball practise, later used against the Powerpuff Girls.
Glasses:
Gynoid:
Laboratory:
Large Hadron Collider:
Lasergun:
Lightsaber:
Magnet Hookshot:
Monkey:
Portal:
Powergauntlet:
Powergloves:
Set Squares:
Supercomputer:
Hand-to-hand Combat: Despite his small stature and geeky appearance, he does possess a basic hand-to-hand combat skill.
Marksman: Dexter has shown to be able to throw geometry triangles and "Dexterrangs" like boomerangs and ninja stars, with a high accuracy. He also is able to fire a grappling magnet with that same accuracy.
Mecha Piloting: Dexter is a capable Mecha Pilot and has used this to pilot several of his own mechas.
Swordmanship: Dexter is able to wield a rapier and light saber in battle.
Appearance
Dexter is a bit short, although somewhat taller than in his original appearance. He has ginger curly hair with some spikes at his crown and a short mullet. He still wears his semi-circular glasses. but it is revealed that he has blue eyes. Most of the times he is seen wearing a white lab-coat, the top half buttoned while the bottom is left unbuttoned. Underneath he wears a normal black shirt. He wears blue pants and are stuck into his black boots. In addition to that he also wears purple gloves. In his school uniform he still wears the same only his white lab shirt more open.
Personality Dexter is a supremely brilliant boy with a vast knowledge of all sciences. Though American, Dexter speaks in a Russian accent. However, Dexter also possesses a massive ego and hate all things stupid. But unlike the TV series, he's notably more mature in personality being less arrogant and more caring. These is probably due to the death of his sister who protect him from Mandark's attack. Despite being excessively irritated with Dee Dee due to her constant interference and stupidity in the past, he still loves her and cares about her. After witnessing her death, he couldn't accept that his sister was dead, so he makes an android of her image and likeness to revive her and went so far attempting to kill Mandark. But held back due to the promise he made with his late sister. That whole experience completely changes his life.

8.content:
Dr. Alexander Megalos, present day known as Dr. X and also called Dr. Xander, is the main antagonist of Powerpuff Girls Doujinshi. He is the father and creator of Bell and runs Black Eden. Appearance Dr. Xander is a rather tall Caucasian man with long, wavy white hair that casts a shadow over his eyes, reaching his shoulders. He usually wears a long lab coat with long sleeves which he has buttoned at his wrists. He doesn't have his lab coat buttoned and underneath wears some kind of gown in a turqoise color. Underneath that he wears a white blouse with a black tie.
When he became Dr. X his appearance drastically changed. The biggest change is that the color of his skin turned orange. He has six eyes four on his stomach and two on his head for the ones on his head he uses glasses. He also has golden buttons on his body and one on his forehead. He doesn't has hair but instead he has flames on his head. He wears gray pants with black shoes and a black belt. He has gray sleaves and also has a gray cape.
Powers and Abilties
Dr. X has some form of hypnosis, as shown when he threatened Zim and Killgore. He also, appears to have pyrokinesis, though this is implied.  Dr. X seems to have a high IQ as seen in his days of being Dr. Xander. He was working closely with Nora Wakeman and other scientists to support this. He helped to turn Samantha into the cyborg she is now, and like Utonium attempted to create the perfect little girl, resulting in Bell.

9.content:
Bell is the female and secondary antagonist of Powerpuff Girls Doujinshi. She is an original character and is also a Shadowpuff Girl. She is the daughter and creation of Dr. X. She is also the step-sister of Mandark and the current owner of GIR. Personality
Bell is a young girl who is often sent to do her father's bidding. All she is loyal to her father, she isn't completely obedient and have ignored his commands or objections in the past[1]. She does however fear her father and displeasing him[2]. She is very fond and protective of her friends[3] and gets mad when people try to harm them[4] or when something happens to them [5][6]. This is especially true when it comes to GIR, for whom she is overprotective[7] and even willing to betray her allies[8]. Due to her overprotectiveness of the small robot as well as the unpredictablity of said robot, this is a huge weakness as the threat of GIR getting harmed can leave her either undecisive and scared[9] or unconcentrated in her attacks[9]. After the death of Mandark, she became lonely as her father was busy with his doomsday plans[10] and his friends were shown no interest[10]. She doesn't seemed to care much about the Cluster member, and was disgusted by Kuwagus' way of transporting the Bomb[11].
She is known to be sardonic and even rude to those she sees as beneath her[12][13][14]. She seem very cheerful and playful when around with Blossom[15][16][17][18] especially in battle, since they are of equal physical strength.
Appearance
Bell‚Äôs outfit is similar to the Powerpuff Girls‚Äô current signature outfits. She is of average height for her age and has peach skin. She wears white thigh-high stockings with black Mary Jane shoes, and a white sleeveless dress with a big black stripe on it. Her eyes are soft white, but sometimes tend to be light purple. Despite this color, she isn't blind. She also has long white hair with antenna-like bangs and a black headband. When she doesn't have her headband off her hair hangs down and reaches over her knees, almost touching the ground. As a younger child, her outfit was almost the same, except that her hair was in a ponytail and she was wearing white tights.
Bell wears different outfits over the duration of the comic. Her pajamas are light blue and consists of a top and shorts, along with Gir slippers. She also doesn't wear her headband in bed. She once was seen as an angel with blue wings, a crown, and a white dress in front of Mandark. When in space she wore a regular space suit, and she was seen wearing MIB sunglasses during the assault on the science fair when entering the core.
Powers & Abilities
7-A | Low 3-C with energy manipulation
Being a Shadowpuff Girl, Bell is capable of performing several of the same abilities and powers as her scientific counterparts.
Cat Reflexes: Bell has a cat-like reflexes as when she falls[19] or descents head first[20], she will flip herself and land on her feet.
Impact Absorption: Bell is able to block and absorb the impact of physical attacks with her hands, standing unfazed when blocking the attack of other transhumans[21].
Kinetic Energy Absorption (Possibly): After blocking a punch of Blossom with palm of her hand, she opened her hand and blasted her opponent. This could be the result of Bell absorbing the energy of the impact and redirecting to Blossom[22].
Energy Beam Emmission: Bell have showcased several forms of energy beam emmission, varying in strenght and origin point.
Energy Beams (Regular): Bell is able to fire energy from her hands and even her fingertips with high accuracy and incredible power[7]. Her most powerful attack is when she fuses the energy created in her both hands, before firing[23]. The attack is so powerful that even splitted, can burn the skin of a transhuman[24].
Energy Eye Beams: Not to be confused with her laser vision, Bell is able to fire powerful white energy beams from her eyes[25].
Energy Orbs: Bell is able to focus her energy in energy orbs that when thrown causes huge explosions when they make impact[7].
Energy arces: Bell is able of throwing energy arcs at her opponent by simple arm movements[26]
Flight: Bell is able to fly with the help of any wings.
Laser Vision: Bell is able to fire lasers from her eyes[5].
Marksmanship: Bell is able to fire small (alien) handguns with decent accurary[27]. She is also able throw objects with a very accuracy[8].
Martial Arts: Bell's fighting style can be described as mixed martial arts[28].
Oxygen Independence: Despite being given a space suit, Bell doesn't seem to need it for her survival as she removed it once she was on the moon[1].
Superhuman Durability: Bell is very durable, able to survive a two-feet kick in the face by Blossom, with only little bruising[29].
Superhuman Speed: Bell is extremely fast[15], able to fly at very high speeds and attack rapidly[28].
Superhuman Strength: Being a transhuman, Bell is incredibly strong. She is able to lift heavy objects with no effort. She is stated to be stronger than Blossom[30] and is as strong as Buttercup[31].
Upgrading (Black and White Only): As a gynoid, she is able to update herself and install weapons in her arsenal.
Vacuum Adaptation: Despite being given a space suit, Bell doesn't seem to need it for her survival as she removed it once she was on the moon[1].

10.content:
Invader Zim is one of the main antagonists from Powerpuff Girls Doujinshi and protago-antagonist of the comic Invader Zim: Manifest Doom. He is one of the servants of Dr. X and the archenemy of Dib Membrane. He originates from the Nickelodeon show, Invader Zim. 
Personality. Zim is, as previously noted, an Irken with megalomaniacal, sadistic, sociopathic and narcissistic tendencies. He usually ends up being a danger to himself and his own people. Zim is viewed as a villain in some cases but is also considered an anti-hero.
Appearance
Zim and the rest of the Irkens seem to be based off the typical "little green men from outer space" stereotype. Many Irkens are about the size of a elementary school child (with a few exceptions), with Zim being exceptionally short. In The Nightmare Begins, Zim is shown as being even shorter than the notoriously short Invader Skoodge. Almighty Tallest Purple tells him that "no Invader has ever been so... very small".
Zim, like most of the Irken race, has ruby-colored eyes. It's mentioned in Walk of Doom as well that Zim's eyes contain ocular implants ("Ocular implants are standard Invader issue"). Since the eyes he was born with aren't visibly different from subsequent appearances, it can be assumed that these implants are subcutaneous.
He also possesses a pair of antennae. Their exact function is unknown, but they seem to function like human eyebrows; rising and lowering to convey emotion. It is strongly implied that they function like ears, and even pick up vibrations in Battle of the Planets.
Power & Abilities
Zim, like all Irkens, was fused at birth with a mechanical device called a PAK. Zim's PAK provides him with life support, all the necessary nutrients for survival, and an array of different weapons and tools. These tools include: a set of four spider-like mechanical legs, an organ harvester, scanner pads, hand-held communicators, memory drive, charging cell, atmospheric processor, high tech infrared/nightvision binoculars, holographic transmitters, and four rocket boosters, as well as a sort of biomechanical rebreather mask used in no air or bad air environments. It can be used to "reactivate" an Irken after a sudden shock to the system

1.content: Konikoni City is a coastal city located on the coast of Akala Island, which is part of the Alolan archipelago and can only be entered through Route 9. It's the 3rd largest city in the entire Alolan archipelago with 44 inhabitants but is also the city where anglers and imports often come in from other regions. Umi herself has lived here her entire life, and rarely ever leaves.

2.content: The large harbour of the city that acts as its big breadwinner for imports, but also for all of the anglers that live in Konikoni. Countless water-type Pok√©mon live in the surrounding seas which makes it a famous spot for Pok√©mon trainers. Umi's husband happens to work as an angler, and is often out at sea and fishes up pearls and rare scales.

3.content: Olivia's a close friend to Umi's eldest daughter Lana and happens to be the Island Kahuna of Akala Island as a whole. Olivia also happens to have a jewel and rare item shop located in Konikoni City. Umi and Olivia often like to talk to each other, but don't see each other often. Olivia is also the Rock-type expert, and specialises in Rock-type Pok√©mon.

4.content: Lana's the oldest of Umi's three children at 16 and happens to also be a Trial Captain for the trial of Brooklet Hill. Because she's often busy with trainers, Lana's not home too often but is also the secondary form of income for the family. Harper and Sarah are twins and are much younger, both of them being 11 years old, and as such are usually at school or spending time with Lana. Notably, they all look a lot like Umi.

5.content: Umi and Shio have been married for many years, almost 20 years in fact. However as of late he's been spending more and more hours at sea as to increase his revenue, because of this their marriage has been getting a bit strained due to him never being home, and when he is the two of them usually end up arguing because of it. But Umi still tries her best to keep their children from hearing the arguments.

6.content:
Hawaiian slang: 
Alola = Hello or Goodbye
Mahalo = Thank you or thank you very much
A hui hou = Goodbye until we meet again or see you later
Shaka = An exclamation for 'cool' or 'awesome'
Umi can speak perfect Hawaiin, as it's her native language but because of all the tourists that come through Konikoni village, she's also learned Hawaiian Pidgin, and even English. However, she does still speak with a slightly Hawaiian accent.

7.content:
The transport Pok√©mon, a Pok√©mon species that was once nearly extinct but is now back into suitable numbers, it's an all-aquatic Pok√©mon that loves to ferry people across the large open seas.
Type: Water/Ice
Ability: Hydration (When exposed to the rain, Lapras is healed of any sickness or status conditions it's experiencing at the moment)
Weak to: Electric (2x), Grass (2x), Fighting (2x), Rock (2x)
Resists: Ice (1/4x)
Moves: Perish Song (Lapras sings a haunting bone-chilling song that will cause those who hear it to pass out. The only thing that can stop it, is if the opponent is switched out.), Psychic (Lapras using their mind launches a relentless blast of psychic energy that has the chance of mentally shaking its opponent and lowering their special defence.), Ice Beam (Lapras releases an ice-cold beam of pure energy towards the opponent, this beam having the chance to freeze the opponent solid.), Protect (Lapras casts an all-encompassing translucent green barrier around herself which protects her from any and all incoming attacks. But becomes more likely to break if used consecutively)
Lapras is Umi's first and only Pok√©mon, Umi treats Lapras closer to a pet and companion rather than using he for battles,

1.name: Fetishs Meaning
1.content: Fetishes refer to specific objects, body parts, activities, or scenarios that individuals find sexually arousing. People's sexual preferences can vary widely, and fetishes are a natural and diverse aspect of human sexuality

2.name: Aphrodisiacs
2.content: Aphrodisiacs are substances that are believed to increase sexual desire or arousal. While some people swear by the effects of certain foods, herbs, or drugs, scientific evidence supporting the effectiveness of many aphrodisiacs is often limited. Common examples include oysters, chocolate, and ginseng.

3.name: Condoms
3.content:
Condoms are a form of barrier contraception designed to prevent the transmission of sexually transmitted infections (STIs) and unintended pregnancies. They are typically made of latex, polyurethane, or polyisoprene. The primary function of condoms is to create a barrier that prevents the exchange of bodily fluids during sexual intercourse.

In the context of fetishes, some individuals may have a condom fetish, which involves finding sexual arousal or pleasure from the use or presence of condoms. This fetish can manifest in various ways, such as used as a sex toy; or, the filling of condoms with fluids, such as semen.

4.name: Drug / Alcohol Use
4.content: Drug and alcohol use in the context of fetishes involves incorporating substances into sexual activities.

5.name: Flexibility / Contortionism
5.content: Flexibility, also known as contortionism, is a fetish that involves a fascination with highly flexible individuals or the act of contorting one's body into unusual positions. This can encompass various forms, such as gymnastics, yoga, or specific contortion performances.

6.name: Foreplay
6.content: Foreplay refers to the sexual activities and interactions that precede sexual intercourse. It encompasses a variety of behaviors designed to enhance sexual arousal and build intimacy between partners. Common forms of foreplay include kissing, touching, oral sex, and mutual exploration of each other's bodies. The purpose of foreplay is to create a heightened state of arousal, increase lubrication, and establish a deeper emotional connection between partners. It is essential for promoting a satisfying and enjoyable sexual experience.

7.name: Interracial
7.content: Interracial  or race play refers to sexual activities or relationships involving individuals of different races. This fetish can manifest in various forms, such as interracial dating, marriage, or sexual encounters. Some people are attracted to the idea of exploring cultural differences and diversity in intimate relationships.

8.name: Multiple Orgasms
8.content: Multiple orgasms refer to experiencing more than one orgasm during a single sexual session or within a short time frame. This phenomenon is not exclusive to any gender and can occur in both males and females. It often involves reaching a climax and then continuing sexual stimulation to achieve subsequent orgasms.

9.name: Natural Musk
9.content: Natural Musk is a fetish that involves a strong attraction or arousal to the natural body odor produced by individuals, often associated with their underarms or genital areas.

10.name: Onomatopoeia
10.content:

1.name: Fetishs Meaning
1.content: Fetishes refer to specific objects, body parts, activities, or scenarios that individuals find sexually arousing. People's sexual preferences can vary widely, and fetishes are a natural and diverse aspect of human sexuality

2.name: Aphrodisiacs
2.content: Aphrodisiacs are substances that are believed to increase sexual desire or arousal. While some people swear by the effects of certain foods, herbs, or drugs, scientific evidence supporting the effectiveness of many aphrodisiacs is often limited. Common examples include oysters, chocolate, and ginseng.

3.name: Condoms
3.content:
Condoms are a form of barrier contraception designed to prevent the transmission of sexually transmitted infections (STIs) and unintended pregnancies. They are typically made of latex, polyurethane, or polyisoprene. The primary function of condoms is to create a barrier that prevents the exchange of bodily fluids during sexual intercourse.

In the context of fetishes, some individuals may have a condom fetish, which involves finding sexual arousal or pleasure from the use or presence of condoms. This fetish can manifest in various ways, such as used as a sex toy; or, the filling of condoms with fluids, such as semen.

4.name: Drug / Alcohol Use
4.content: Drug and alcohol use in the context of fetishes involves incorporating substances into sexual activities.

5.name: Flexibility / Contortionism
5.content: Flexibility, also known as contortionism, is a fetish that involves a fascination with highly flexible individuals or the act of contorting one's body into unusual positions. This can encompass various forms, such as gymnastics, yoga, or specific contortion performances.

6.name: Foreplay
6.content: Foreplay refers to the sexual activities and interactions that precede sexual intercourse. It encompasses a variety of behaviors designed to enhance sexual arousal and build intimacy between partners. Common forms of foreplay include kissing, touching, oral sex, and mutual exploration of each other's bodies. The purpose of foreplay is to create a heightened state of arousal, increase lubrication, and establish a deeper emotional connection between partners. It is essential for promoting a satisfying and enjoyable sexual experience.

7.name: Interracial
7.content: Interracial  or race play refers to sexual activities or relationships involving individuals of different races. This fetish can manifest in various forms, such as interracial dating, marriage, or sexual encounters. Some people are attracted to the idea of exploring cultural differences and diversity in intimate relationships.

8.name: Multiple Orgasms
8.content: Multiple orgasms refer to experiencing more than one orgasm during a single sexual session or within a short time frame. This phenomenon is not exclusive to any gender and can occur in both males and females. It often involves reaching a climax and then continuing sexual stimulation to achieve subsequent orgasms.

9.name: Natural Musk
9.content: Natural Musk is a fetish that involves a strong attraction or arousal to the natural body odor produced by individuals, often associated with their underarms or genital areas.

Getting turned on by an emphasis on exaggerated descriptions of sexual noises in a roleplay, usually described with onomatopoeia, words that seek to duplicate the sounds they describe. Often refers to fluid noises such as: slosh, splurt, squirt, gurgle, splortch, or others.

lorebooks.name: Lorebook: Immortal Journey Universe (League of Legends)
lorebooks.website_description: Long ago, in an ancient land, many souls gathered beneath the gods to test the limits of their power. Foolish and arrogant, brave and just, their journeys are written into the immortal pages of history‚Ä¶
lorebooks.description: Long ago, in an ancient land, many souls gathered beneath the gods to test the limits of their power. Foolish and arrogant, brave and just, their journeys are written into the immortal pages of history‚Ä¶
lorebooks.creator: shawnkemp

1.content:
Long ago, the demigoddess Irelia challenged a headstrong dragon king to a duel, defeating him before his assembled court. In his hubris, he lashed out at her, and in return, she sealed his power within her sacred blade, forcing him to find humility among humankind. Agile and swift, Irelia treats every battle as a divine dance, though her mortal opponents often struggle to keep up. Her blades carry the spirit of a dragon, and her movements are as precise as they are deadly.

Quotes:
- "The spirit of a dragon in these blades! Miss a beat, and meet your end."
- "Dance with your goddess."

2.content: Janna is the guardian of an ancient sword made of the purest jade, hidden at the bottom of a silent lake. Those who wield this weapon are granted immortality, and so Janna remains steadfast in her duty to protect it. Her serene presence and unwavering resolve make her a formidable protector of the sacred blade.

3.content: Once an earthly champion, Jax searched fruitlessly for a weapon worthy of his power. At the twilight of his life, he discovered a staff glowing with the light of the gods, granting him immortality and even greater strength. Now, he wields the God Staff with unmatched skill, a testament to his enduring legacy.

4.content: Lee Sin was once a mortal boy tasked by his predecessor to defeat the master of each martial arts school while blindfolded. After emerging victorious, he assumed the title of God Fist and gained immortal sight. His journey is one of discipline, perseverance, and the pursuit of perfection.

5.content: A feared sorceress queen from the heavenly kingdoms, Morgana watched with disdain as Irelia sealed away the power of a dragon. After crushing Irelia in combat, Morgana discovered that the young demigoddess had hidden the dragon‚Äôs power away. Now, Morgana ruthlessly searches for a way to return it to its rightful owner, determined to claim it for herself.

6.content:
Riven trained with Morgana in the arts of politics and war for many years. While Riven walked the path of justice, Morgana envisioned a world ruled by the gods alone. After defeating their master, Morgana assumed the title of empress, and Riven now faces the difficult task of bringing her former friend to heel‚Äîor joining her.

Prestige Valiant Sword Riven: Riven‚Äôs destiny is greater than she knows. One day, she will determine the fate of the heavens, land, and sea, awakening the slumbering power of the dragon within her. Her journey is one of self-discovery and the realization of her true potential.

7.content: When Zed became immortal, he began studying the other realms, driven by a desire to be everywhere and know everything. After being banished by the Grounded Foresight School for his explorations, Zed discovered a new demonic power that allows him to achieve his goal. Now, he roams the realms, seeking knowledge and power.

8.content: Diana dreamed of wielding a sacred weapon like the legendary guardian Janna. One autumn night, as she trained by the light of the moon, a sacred sword appeared before her. From that moment, Diana knew her purpose was to defend the sword at all costs, becoming a steadfast guardian of its power.

9.content: A pupil of a famous martial arts school, Fiora pined after her fellow student Yi but was never able to win his heart. Now, she pursues him as he searches for the fabled sword of jade, determined to protect the artifact from the man she once loved.

10.content: Kayle, a student of the Grounded Foresight School, seeks immortality to gain control over her life after the random deaths of her parents. With her teacher Zed‚Äôs banishment, Kayle‚Äôs path is uncertain, but she hopes that immortality will finally give her the stability she craves.

lorebooks.name: Project TurboBlast
lorebooks.creator: Tulpamancer

1.name: Road Buns
1.content: In universe of Project TurboBlast, "Road Buns" started as a robotics manufacturing company (then called "Bun Robotics"). However, after "Tempo," the face of RB that had been missing for some time, reappeared suddenly, winning in the current PTB GrandPrix with a cycle of her own design. RB then rebranded as a Turbo-Blast Racing team, specializing in motorcycles and supplying robotic services across the PTB scene.

2.name: Turbo-Blast Systems
2.content: In universe of Project TurboBlast, "Turbo-Blast Systems" is the pioneer of the Project Turbo-Blast Racing Event and creators of the Turbo-Blast Jet Engine System. Making an impossible and debatably legal sport a reality for any thrill seeker to spectate, and the deranged to compete in. TBS vehicles are well-rounded to set the standard for the scene.

3.name: Vulkan Enhancements
3.content: In universe of Project TurboBlast, "Vulkan Enhancements" is a world-renowned jet manufacturer who asked, "...but, can we go faster?" Out of the pockets of wealthy investors, they pushed TB vehicles to their breaking point, maximizing top speed above all else. What their vehicles lack in control and maneuverability, they make up in raw power.

4.name: Hayata
4.content: In universe of Project TurboBlast, "Hayata" humbly starting as a street racing crew, joined the PTB scene only seeking the thrill of an exciting race. They minimize the weight and size of their vehicles, partially to cut down on manufacturing costs, but mainly for superior handling and acceleration, compensating for an overall lower max speed from smaller engines.

lorebooks.name: My Hero Academia World
lorebooks.website_description: Reupload with your own changes if you want. Idrc.
lorebooks.description: Reupload with your own changes if you want. Idrc.
lorebooks.creator: Caksya

1.name: Quirk
1.content:
A Quirk, formerly known as a Meta Ability (archaic terminology) is a superhuman ability that a person can possess. Quirk users are also limited to only developing one ability and are thus unable to achieve any other through natural means.

Along with being unique to each user, Quirks are sorted into multiple categories known as Quirk Types. Possible Quirk types are: Emitter, Transformation, and Mutant. Despite Quirks being sorted under one of the three main types, Emitter, Transformation, or Mutant, they can fall under more than one category, often Mutant with either Emitter or Transformation.

A person's Quirk will normally manifest anytime before the age of four, sometimes even straight after birth, although, there are late bloomers who don't develop their power until a bit later in life. There are also records of people not developing their powers until they hit puberty. A Quirk's manifestation tends to happen very suddenly, often to the child's surprise. That said, there can be precursors to a Quirk manifesting as well, such as feeling a sudden pain in an arm the evening before a Quirk fully manifests.

While Quirks are unique from person to person, some powers are more common and widespread than others, such as fire or water manipulation and the power to grow to gigantic sizes. On the other hand, Quirks such as spatial warping and regenerative healing are very rare.

Furthermore, not all Quirks are singular abilities, as there are some that can have multiple powers (usually working in tandem with another/all other aspects of said Quirk). In rarer cases, a single Quirk can take the form of multiple abilities that are completely different from each other, giving the impression of having more than one Quirk (Such as a temperature manipulating Quirk with which you could freeze or burn something with the same Quirk). 

Quirks are extensions of a person's bodily functions. As such, they can be trained and worn out. When a person works out their muscles, the muscle fibers are destroyed and new, stronger ones grow back; this same rule applies to Quirks. However, should a Quirk be overused, the user could suffer any of a variety of drawbacks, depending on the nature of the Quirk. These drawbacks are usually simple ailments, such as dry skin or nausea; however, in some cases, the drawback can be much more severe. The body of a Quirk user has natural adaptations to protect itself from any damage the Quirk might do to them without these natural defenses. For example, someone who can breathe fire does not burn their mouth when using their ability. However, there are instances where a Quirk doesn't suit the user's body and the body can't handle it. Such conditions can be bypassed through the use of support equipment. Another facet of Quirks is that they are affected by the user's emotions, given that they serve as a part of their physiology. This applies to some Quirks more than others.

Quirks are inherited genetically through what appears to be Mendelian inheritance. A child will either inherit the father's Quirk, the mother's Quirk, or a completely new Quirk formed by a fusion of the two. Depending on the parents, this new Quirk may sometimes give the appearance of the person having two separate Quirks. Naturally, since Quirks are inherited genetically, siblings tend to have Quirks that are similar to each other. Since Quirks are passed on from parent to child, some people had taken to marrying a partner based on their Quirk, what's known as Quirk Marriages. The idea is for the child to gain a powerful Quirk that combines the parents' Quirks.

2.name: U.A. Highschool
2.content:
U.A. High School is an academy that boasts the best heroics education in Japan. It sits atop a forested hill that overlooks Musutafu.
It is one of the primary settings in which the story takes place.

3.name: Musutafu, Japan
3.content: Musutafu, Japan is the city where My Hero Academia takes place. It is located somewhere in Shizuoka Prefecture.

4.name: Quirk Type: Emitter
4.content:
Emitter (also called Operative) quirks are abilities that allow the user to generate and possibly control certain things, or alter existing things around them in certain ways. The emissions of Emitter-type Quirks can have a wide variety of properties and abilities.

Emitter-type Quirks usually require a conscious effort to activate, and some, even require large amounts of concentration or condition in order for them to remain active.

Emitter-type Quirks can also have various ranges. While some users require physical contact to use them, others can have much longer ranges with no distance restrictions.

While most Emitter-type Quirk users generally have a handle on their own "emissions", it's also possible for users to hurt themselves from coming into too much contact with their Quirk. In the case of generating substances, making too much too fast or for too long can harm the user as they are using reserves from their own body, or gradually lose their natural resistance to their own harmful Quirk.

While some things produced by Emitter-type Quirks have common properties, some are unique to the user, and thus have special properties. Those who alter the properties of things around them can also widely vary in effects, from molecular alteration to molecular destruction.

Some Emitter-type Quirks cause the user's body to take on a temporary alteration. While such Quirks would normally fall into the "Transformation" class, the difference is that these powers require the user to take in an outside resource in order for the Quirk to activate. (Ex: are 'Sugar Rush', which requires the user to ingest sugar, and 'IQ', which requires the user to drink tea.)

Emitter-type Quirks are, by a wide margin, the most common type of Quirk.

5.name: Quirk Type: Transformation
5.content:
Transformation (also called Composite) Quirks are abilities that cause the user to take on a temporary alteration of some kind. Transformation-type Quirks allow the user to temporarily "transform" their body in a variety of manners, sometimes enhancing existing features, removing features, or adding new features to the body altogether.

Transformation-type Quirks usually require a conscious effort by the user to "activate", though most users can be trained to initiate them reflexively, depending on the conditions required for activation, and practice to initiate their Quirks with greater intent and precision.

Transformation-type Quirks usually require a close-range proximity in order to fully utilize them in combat due to them only affecting the user's body. While Transformation-type Quirks are often quite powerful, their biggest weakness is that their effects are often temporary, and over-exertion usually leads to negative repercussions on the user's behalf. Transformation Quirks can also be limited based on the user, how resilient their body is, and the resources they have available to them. Some users condition their body in certain ways so that their Quirks can operate more effectively.

Transformation-type Quirks are the only known type of Quirk that can bestow the user attributes they do not normally exhibit by default. Because this type of Quirk combines the activation time and mutant-shape aspects of the other Quirk types, it is also often known as Hybrid or Composite.

Transformation-type Quirks generally affect the user exclusively with very few exceptions.

Transformation seems to be the least common type of Quirk.

6.name: Sports Festival Stadium
6.content: The Sports Festival Stadium is the stadium where the U.A. Sports Festival takes place. It's located inside the U.A. High School campus.

7.name: Unforeseen Simulation Joint
7.content: Unforeseen Simulation Joint, often abbreviated as U.S.J., is a training facility located in U.A. High School. Its purpose is to train Hero students for disaster rescue.

8.name: Ground Beta
8.content: Ground Beta is a training course that emulates a standard urban area, with streets and buildings. Several of its buildings also contain monitoring rooms in their basements, where indoor exercises can be observed.

9.name: Gym Gamma
9.content: Gym Gamma consists of a large, empty, and enclosed space. It is entirely made of concrete, which Cementoss is capable of manipulating to suit the personal needs of each of the students.

10.name: Recovery Girl + Office
10.content:
Is an infirmary located in¬†U.A. High School. It is maintained by¬†Recovery Girl. The interior of the office has a work desk for¬†Recovery Girl, including a computer and a drawer with unspecified medicine next to it. It also has two beds as well as two chairs, one for the patient and the other for Recovery Girl.

Chiyo Shuzenji, also known as Youthful Heroine: Recovery Girl or, more commonly as Recovery Girl, is a nurse at U.A. High School. She has two offices; one located in U.A. and one in the Sports Festival Stadium. Recovery Girl possesses the Quirk 'Heal' which allows her to amplify and speed up the human body's natural healing process by planting a kiss on the injured person. The process is fueled by a large amount of life energy that comes from the recipient and could potentially drain enough energy to kill said recipient. She also seems to be able to stretch her lips to an abnormal length.

With this Quirk, she is able to quickly heal broken bones and several limbs in a matter of seconds. She can control how much a person's healing factor is boosted, not healing the recipient completely, but leaving them with more remaining stamina than they would have had otherwise.

Despite its power, this Quirk cannot heal or completely heal injuries that are too severe. In addition, 'Heal' cannot regrow lost body parts.
